text: Interstate 180 (I-180) is a -long connector in the U.S. state of Wyoming between Interstate 80 and downtown Cheyenne, Wyoming. It is unusual for being one of the few Interstate highways that does not follow Interstate highway standards. There is also no freeway anywhere along its route. It is a divided highway with a speed limit due to the frequency of signals. ==References== 180
title: Interstate 180 (Wyoming)
